description: Grilled romaine lettuce with a rich and creamy blue cheese dressing is a delicious side dish for burgers or chicken wings.
name: Grilled Romaine Lettuce with Blue Cheese Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 heads romaine lettuce, sliced into quarters

recipeInstructions.text: Brush the romaine wedges with olive oil all over. Heat a large griddle pan on the highest heat and sear the wedges for 1 minute on each side until lightly charred, working in batches.
Whisk the blue cheese, yoghurt, sour cream, garlic and lemon juice together to make a dressing. Arrange the wedges on a serving platter, drizzle with dressing, top with chives and serve.
